resources.string:
This application has already started and will continue to run in the background unless you tap on the "Stop Service" button. 

Once you send a SMS containing the passcode to this device, the flashlight will start flashing and the ringtone will start ringing at maximum volume (even if it was set to silent). 

Once the device has been found, simply press the lock screen button and the flashlight as well as the ringtone will be stopped. If the device was not found then it will automatically stop after 5 minutes in order to conserve battery.
